const StateDistribution & KernelAverager::KernelAverage::basis_weights (  )  const [virtual]

Returns:
A mapping of states to UNNORMALIZED weights. Each state reference in the mapping is non-NULL.

const KernelAveragerRef KernelAverager::KernelAverage::m_averager [private]

Definition at line 186 of file averager.hh.

NeighborContainer KernelAverager::KernelAverage::m_neighbors [private]

A sorted array of the basis states near the given state, sorted in ascending order of distance.

Should contain all the states within m_averager->m_maxd of the given state, except the ones pruned according to m_averager->m_minfraction.
